name: Henri's Way Home
description:
Henri's Way Home is a one-level platformer where the player takes on the role of Henri, a baby duck that has found himself lost in the swear and must make it out to reunion with their family. Navigate through a simple platformer in order to find your way out.

Credits:

Programming: Alex Cline & Steven Drovie

2D Art: Allison Antisdel

UI: Kenzine Lingren
